availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh T. Anderson (Cass County, IL, blacksmith and kidnapper)

body.p: Cass County, Illinois, blacksmith. Illinois native. Married to Lucy A. Anderson. Father of Eliza I. Anderson. Blacksmith in Cass County, Illinois, in 1850. Indicted by the Richland Circuit Court for the kidnapping of Thomas M. Adams in Richland County, Illinois, in November 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cass County, Virginia, p. 44B.
KYR-0001-006-0001.
